languages.text: {n}Бережно, словно младенца укутывает в объятия новоиспеченная мать, Джай Хейдари лелеет клочок изъеденного письменами пергамента.{/n} "Ах шерин, свет очей моих, благодетель{mf||ница} страждущих! Отныне над небесным куполом протектората фон Валанциус сияет сразу два солнца — слепящее и всемогущее, как сам{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, и светило поменьше. Подобное {mf|его|ее} скромной партнерше, владелице Меркатум Табула Официале и просто очаровательной женщине Джай Хейдари".

traits.locale_text: {n}Бережно, словно младенца укутывает в объятия новоиспеченная мать, Джай Хейдари лелеет клочок изъеденного письменами пергамента.{/n} "Ах шерин, свет очей моих, благодетель{mf||ница} страждущих! Отныне над небесным куполом протектората фон Валанциус сияет сразу два солнца — слепящее и всемогущее, как сам{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, и светило поменьше. Подобное {mf|его|ее} скромной партнерше, владелице Меркатум Табула Официале и просто очаровательной женщине Джай Хэйдари".

languages.text: {n}Jae Heydari tenderly holds the piece of script-covered parchment like a young mother nursing her newborn child.{/n} "Shereen, light of my eyes, giver of boons and saviour of the needy! From now on, two suns will grace the firmament of the von Valancius protectorate, one bright and powerful like the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|himself|herself}, and the other slightly more humble. Like {mf|his|her} unassuming partner, the diligent owner of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and all-around delight, Jae Heydari."

Отныне над небесным куполом протектората фон Валанциус сияет сразу два солнца — слепящее и всемогущее, как сам{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}, и светило поменьше. Подобное {mf|его|ее} скромной партнерше, владелице Меркатум Табула Официале и просто очаровательной женщине Джай Хейдари".

From now on two suns will grace the firmament of the Von Valancius protectorate, one bright and powerful like the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|himself|herself} and the other slightly more humble. Like {mf|his|her} unassuming partner, the diligent owner of Mercatum Tabula Officiale and an all-round nice person Jae Heydari."

From now on, two suns will grace the firmament of the von Valancius protectorate, one bright and powerful like the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|himself|herself}, and the other slightly more humble. Like {mf|his|her} unassuming partner, the diligent owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale and all-around delight, Jae Heydari."

languages.text: {n}婕伊·海达利温柔地捧着那张写满了文字的羊皮纸，仿佛年轻的母亲在哺育她刚刚出生的孩子。{/n}“亲爱的，我眼中的明光！恩惠的施予者，困苦之人的救世主！从这一刻开始，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝属地的苍穹之中，将会升起两轮太阳。其中一轮就像{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}本人一样明亮而强大，而另一轮太阳则稍显谦虚，正如{mf|他|她}平易近人的伙伴，帝国官方行商执照的持有者，喜笑颜开的婕伊·海达利，始终陪在{mf|他|她}身边。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae Heydari tenderly holds the piece of script-covered parchment like a young mother nursing her newborn child.{/n} "Shereen, light of my eyes, giver of boons and saviour of the needy! From now on, two suns will grace the firmament of the von Valancius protectorate, one bright and powerful like the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|himself|herself}, and the other slightly more humble. Like {mf|his|her} unassuming partner, the diligent owner of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and all-around delight, Jae Heydari."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊·海达利温柔地捧着那张写满了文字的羊皮纸，仿佛年轻的母亲在哺育她刚刚出生的孩子。{/n}“亲爱的，我眼中的明光！恩惠的施予者，困苦之人的救世主！从这一刻开始，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝属地的苍穹之中，将会升起两轮太阳。其中一轮就像{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}本人一样明亮而强大，而另一轮太阳则稍显谦虚，正如{mf|他|她}平易近人的伙伴，帝国官方行商执照的持有者，喜笑颜开的婕伊·海达利，始终陪在{mf|他|她}身边。”

{n}婕伊·海达利温柔地捧着那张写满了文字的羊皮纸，仿佛年轻的母亲在哺育她刚刚出生的孩子。{/n}“亲爱的，我眼中的明光！恩惠的施予者，困苦之人的救世主！从这一刻开始，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝属地的苍穹之中，将会升起两轮太阳。其中一轮就像{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}本人一样明亮而强大，而另一轮太阳则稍显谦虚，正如{mf|他|她}平易近人的伙伴，帝国官方行商执照的持有者，喜笑颜开的婕伊·海达利，始终陪在{mf|他|她}身边。”

languages.original_text: {n}Jae Heydari tenderly holds the piece of script-covered parchment like a young mother nursing her newborn child.{/n} "Shereen, light of my eyes, giver of boons and saviour of the needy! From now on, two suns will grace the firmament of the von Valancius protectorate, one bright and powerful like the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}, and the other slightly more humble. Like {mf|his|her} unassuming partner, the diligent owner of a Mercatum Tabula Officiale and all-around delight, Jae Heydari."

languages.text: {n}Jae Heydari sostiene con cariño el pergamino lleno de texto, como una madre primeriza acunando a su recién nacido.{/n} «¡Shereen, luz de mis ojos, dador{mf||a} de bendiciones y salvador{mf||a} de los necesitados! De ahora en adelante, dos soles adornarán el firmamento del protectorado von Valancius, uno tan resplandeciente y poderoso como {mf|el propio|la propia} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y otro un poco más humilde: su modesta compañera, dueña diligente de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale y encanto en general, Jae Heydari».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae Heydari tenderly holds the piece of script-covered parchment like a young mother nursing her newborn child.{/n} "Shereen, light of my eyes, giver of boons and saviour of the needy! From now on, two suns will grace the firmament of the von Valancius protectorate, one bright and powerful like the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|himself|herself}, and the other slightly more humble. Like {mf|his|her} unassuming partner, the diligent owner of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and all-around delight, Jae Heydari."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae Heydari sostiene con cariño el pergamino lleno de texto, como una madre primeriza acunando a su recién nacido.{/n} «¡Shereen, luz de mis ojos, dador{mf||a} de bendiciones y salvador{mf||a} de los necesitados! De ahora en adelante, dos soles adornarán el firmamento del protectorado von Valancius, uno tan resplandeciente y poderoso como {mf|el propio|la propia} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} y otro un poco más humilde: su modesta compañera, dueña diligente de una Mercatum Tabula Officiale y encanto en general, Jae Heydari».

languages.text: {n}ジェイ・ヘイダリは、まるで生まれたばかりの子供をあやす若い母親のように、その羊皮紙を優しく抱きしめた。{/n}「シャリーン、あたしの目の光、恩寵を授けし者、困窮者の救世主よ！これからは、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の大空に二つの太陽が輝くだろう。一つは{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}閣下のように明るく力強く、もう一つはもう少し謙虚に。閣下の控えめなパートナー、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルの勤勉なオーナーであり、万事に歓びを与えるジェイ・ヘイダリのように」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae Heydari tenderly holds the piece of script-covered parchment like a young mother nursing her newborn child.{/n} "Shereen, light of my eyes, giver of boons and saviour of the needy! From now on, two suns will grace the firmament of the von Valancius protectorate, one bright and powerful like the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|himself|herself}, and the other slightly more humble. Like {mf|his|her} unassuming partner, the diligent owner of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and all-around delight, Jae Heydari."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイ・ヘイダリは、まるで生まれたばかりの子供をあやす若い母親のように、その羊皮紙を優しく抱きしめた。{/n}「シャリーン、あたしの目の光、恩寵を授けし者、困窮者の救世主よ！これからは、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の大空に二つの太陽が輝くだろう。一つは{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}閣下のように明るく力強く、もう一つはもう少し謙虚に。閣下の控えめなパートナー、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルの勤勉なオーナーであり、万事に歓びを与えるジェイ・ヘイダリのように」

{n}ジェイ・ヘイダリは、まるで生まれたばかりの子供をあやす若い母親のように、その羊皮紙を優しく抱きしめた。{/n}「ねえ、アタシの目の光、恩寵を授けし者、困窮者の救世主よ！これからは、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の大空に二つの太陽が輝くだろう。一つは{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}閣下のように明るく力強く、もう一つはもう少し謙虚に。閣下の控えめなパートナー、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルの勤勉なオーナーであり、万事に歓びを与えるジェイ・ヘイダリのように」

languages.text: {n}Jae Heydari hält das Stück beschriebenes Pergament so vorsichtig wie eine junge Mutter ihr neugeborenes Kind.{/n} "Shereen, Licht meiner Augen, {mf|Segensbringer und Retter|Segensbringerin und Retterin} der Bedürftigen! Von nun an werden zwei Sonnen das Firmament des Protektorats von Valancius ziehen, eine so hell und mächtig wie {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} selbst, die andere etwas bescheidener. Wie {mf|seine|ihre} unscheinbare Partnerin, die fleißige Inhaberin der Mercatum Tabula Officiale und ganz entzückende Zeitgenossin Jae Heydari."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae Heydari tenderly holds the piece of script-covered parchment like a young mother nursing her newborn child.{/n} "Shereen, light of my eyes, giver of boons and saviour of the needy! From now on, two suns will grace the firmament of the von Valancius protectorate, one bright and powerful like the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|himself|herself}, and the other slightly more humble. Like {mf|his|her} unassuming partner, the diligent owner of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and all-around delight, Jae Heydari."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae Heydari hält das Stück beschriebenes Pergament so vorsichtig wie eine junge Mutter ihr neugeborenes Kind.{/n} "Shereen, Licht meiner Augen, {mf|Segensbringer und Retter|Segensbringerin und Retterin} der Bedürftigen! Von nun an werden zwei Sonnen das Firmament des Protektorats von Valancius ziehen, eine so hell und mächtig wie {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} selbst, die andere etwas bescheidener. Wie {mf|seine|ihre} unscheinbare Partnerin, die fleißige Inhaberin einer Mercatum Tabula Officiale und ganz entzückende Zeitgenossin Jae Heydari."

{n}Jae Heydari hält das Stück beschriebenes Pergament so vorsichtig wie eine junge Mutter ihr neugeborenes Kind.{/n} "Shereen, Licht meiner Augen, {mf|Segensbringer und Retter|Segensbringerin und Retterin} der Bedürftigen! Von nun an werden zwei Sonnen das Firmament des Protektorats von Valancius ziehen, eine so hell und mächtig wie {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} selbst, die andere etwas bescheidener. Wie {mf|seine|ihre} unscheinbare Partnerin, die fleißige Inhaberin einer Mercatum Tabula Officiale und ganz entzückende Zeitgenossin Jae Heydari."

languages.text: {n}Jae Heydari tient le morceau de parchemin couvert de texte aussi tendrement qu'une jeune mère avec son nouveau-né.{/n} « Shereen, prunelle de mes yeux, {mf|bienfaiteur|bienfaitrice} et {mf|sauveur|sauveuse} des nécessiteux ! Désormais, deux soleils illumineront les cieux du protectorat von Valancius : l'un brillant et puissant comme {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} {mf|lui-même|elle-même}, et un autre légèrement plus modeste, à l'image de son humble partenaire, la détentrice scrupuleuse de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale que tout le monde aime, Jae Heydari. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae Heydari tenderly holds the piece of script-covered parchment like a young mother nursing her newborn child.{/n} "Shereen, light of my eyes, giver of boons and saviour of the needy! From now on, two suns will grace the firmament of the von Valancius protectorate, one bright and powerful like the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|himself|herself}, and the other slightly more humble. Like {mf|his|her} unassuming partner, the diligent owner of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and all-around delight, Jae Heydari."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae Heydari tient le morceau de parchemin couvert de texte aussi tendrement qu'une jeune mère avec son nouveau-né.{/n} « Shereen, prunelle de mes yeux, {mf|bienfaiteur|bienfaitrice} et {mf|sauveur|sauveuse} des nécessiteux ! Désormais, deux soleils illumineront les cieux du protectorat von Valancius : l'un brillant et puissant comme {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} {mf|lui-même|elle-même}, et un autre légèrement plus modeste, à l'image de son humble partenaire, la détentrice scrupuleuse de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale que tout le monde aime, Jae Heydari. »

languages.text: {n}Jae Heydari; yazılarla dolu parşömen parçasını, yeni doğan bebeğini emziren genç bir anne gibi tutuyor.{/n} "Şirinim, gözümün bebeği, iyilik timsalim, ihtiyaç sahipleriyle ilgilenenim! Bu andan itibaren von Valancius protektorasının semalarını iki güneş süsleyecek. Birisi {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} kendisi gibi parlak ve kudretli, diğeri ise biraz daha mütevazı. Onun alçakgönüllü ortağı, Mercatum Tabula Officiale'nin hamarat hamili ve dünya tatlısı Jae Heydari gibi."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae Heydari tenderly holds the piece of script-covered parchment like a young mother nursing her newborn child.{/n} "Shereen, light of my eyes, giver of boons and saviour of the needy! From now on, two suns will grace the firmament of the von Valancius protectorate, one bright and powerful like the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} {mf|himself|herself}, and the other slightly more humble. Like {mf|his|her} unassuming partner, the diligent owner of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale and all-around delight, Jae Heydari."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae Heydari, yazılarla dolu parşömen parçasını, yeni doğan bebeğini emziren genç bir anne gibi tutuyor.{/n} "Şirinim, gözümün bebeği, iyilik timsalim, ihtiyaç sahipleriyle ilgilenenim! Bu andan itibaren von Valancius protektorasının semalarını iki güneş süsleyecek. Birisi {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in kendisi gibi parlak ve kudretli, diğeri ise biraz daha mütevazı. Onun alçakgönüllü partneri, Mercatum Tabula Officiale'nin hamarat sahibi ve dünya tatlısı Jae Heydari gibi."
